message.content:
1. Abdominal circumference decreased significantly in the participants.
2. The average decrease in abdominal circumference was 11.3 cm with a standard deviation of 6.7 cm.
3. The decrease in abdominal circumference was statistically significant with a P-value less than 0.001.
4. The changes in abdominal circumference were more significant in the case group.
5. The decrease in abdominal circumference in the case group was 13.9 cm.
